features.name: Mandelbrot Set Integration for Enhanced Orchestration
features.description: Integrate Mandelbrot set algorithms for escape-time supervision, fractal task decomposition, convergence detection, and bounded region analysis to improve orchestration efficiency and reliability. Implements: (1) Escape-time trajectory tracking to detect diverging agents before timeout, (2) Fractal self-similar decomposition for multi-scale task breakdown, (3) Fixed-point convergence detection for feedback loop termination, (4) Bounded region analysis for scope connectivity and parallelization safety, (5) Supervision tree with restart limits based on max_iteration principle.
verification: Escape-time supervision: Agents tracked with divergence scores, early abort on trajectory escape
Fractal decomposition: Task complexity measurement determines atomic vs recursive handling
Convergence detection: Feedback loops detect fixed-point convergence and oscillation patterns
Scope connectivity: analyze_scope_connectivity() determines parallel vs sequential execution
Restart limits: Supervision respects MAX_RESTARTS_PER_AGENT (Mandelbrot max_iteration analog)
Backward compatibility: Existing orchestrate commands work identically
New signals: ESCAPING, CONVERGED, OSCILLATING, ESCALATE, DECOMPOSED emitted correctly
Trajectory metrics: trace.jsonl includes divergence_score, change_rate, complexity measurements
Checkpoints preserve: AGENT_METRICS, ITERATION_OUTPUTS, fractal state for recovery

plan.approach: Hybrid augmentation - Mandelbrot algorithms enhance existing Turing's Maze orchestration
